faq.question: What is a Chrome Hackathon?
faq.answer: Chrome Hackathon is a mini hackathon that participants can join and challenge themselves to use technology and updates from Chrome Dev Summit 2020 into a project solution where participants can also get a mentoring session and feedback from hackathon mentors.

faq.question: Who can participate?
faq.answer: a professional or a student for hackers, coders, and makers.

faq.question: Where will the Hackathon take place?
What is in for me?
faq.answer: Learning new skills, looks good on your CV, networking, winning cash prizes, working as a team, meet great people, have great food and having fun!

faq.question: How are the winners selected?
faq.answer: There will be an independent Jury selecting the winners with a rating system.

faq.question: Who will be judging?
faq.answer: The judge panel composition will be announced closer to the date of the hackathon.

faq.question: How many people should a Team be?
What are the costs of participating?
Do we sign up as individuals or as a team?
faq.answer: You can register as a team or individuals.

faq.question: Can we use any programming language?
Who is keeping the intellectual property of my solution?
faq.answer: The team that develops the project is the owner of the intellectual property and project.. Before the Presentations our technical team will do a quick technical check to make sure that you created your project at the hackathon. You are allowed to use open source libraries, your own libraries etc. to develop your solution!

faq.question: What is the problem we will be hacking to solve?
faq.answer: Details of the business problem will be announced on the day of the event.

faq.question: I have another question that is not answered in your FAQs, what should I do?
faq.answer: Contact us in the telegram group. Donâ€™t be shy! We are here to help and create a great atmosphere, drop your question below.
